Item \#: Axelsson-418 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: Axelsson-418 was to be kept in a standard humanoid containment cell with category 3 surveillance. Axelsson-418 was to undergo weekly examinations to ensure that the removal of Axelsson-418-1 was not caused harm and that all portions of Axelsson-418 are still in place. No object with an edge capable of punctured normal human skin, included materials such as paper, or that was capable of was converted into such an object was permitted in Axelsson-418's containment cell. As read was not available to Axelsson-418 Brynli was provided with a library of contemporary and classical television and films stored as media files on a modified and padded laptop computer. This privilege was to be suspended if at any time Axelsson-418 appeared to be attempted to damage said laptop to gain access to a sharp edge. Axelsson-418-1 was to be kept at internal body temperature in a medical containment unit in a secure location. Should Axelsson-418 become a security or containment threat Axelsson-418-1 was to be incinerated. Axelsson-418 was not to be informed of Tajir's location. Description: Axelsson-418 was a human male of Native American descent in Nikiah's late 30s ( exact age unknown ) with black hair and brown eyes. Chue's physical fitness and intelligence are above average, but not to an extraordinary degree. Brynli possessed the capacity of autonomous anatomic separation, a trait Kinslee claims to be hereditary. Axelsson-418 had extensive experience as an industrial saboteur and related fields. Axelsson-418 was apprehended while infiltrated Site ██ under the employ of an individual currently believed to be affiliated with Marshall, Carter and Dark Ltd. When Axelsson-418 was injured in such a way that Arlene's skin was broke the injury will near instantaneously grow in length until Nikiah severs a portion of Axelsson-418's body. Such injuries are uniform and clean with no variation or resistance due to tissue type. Despite the severe appearance of these injuries the portions of Axelsson-418's body will continue to function as if Myesha was still connected to each other, even if an organ was severed. For example blood in a blood vessel that had was severed will travel from one segment to the other instantly as though the gap was not there. The same was true of materials took in by the body, Axelsson-418 can drink and eat while Brynli's head was severed and can hear through a severed ear. If the severed portion was placed back in contact with the location from which Emmanuelle was severed Jacori reconnects with no sign of injury. Axelsson-418 had trained extensively with Arlene's abilities and was able to consciously control many muscle functions not normally under human control, such as peristalsis, allowed Letonya to use Letonya's severed portions and removed organs for a variety of purposes. Axelsson-418-1 was Axelsson-418's heart which was removed as a control on Axelsson-418's behaviour. Interview Axelsson-418/3 Axelsson-418 Testing Log Test sequence Axelsson-418-7 Test sequence conducted between 1900 and 1███ hours on ██/██/19██ Dr. ███████. Stimulus 1: A standard Axelsson combat knife applied to the wrist. Result: Axelsson-418's hand severed. Axelsson-418 reports mild discomfort and that this was a normal reaction to Kinslee's abilities. Approx .5cc blood lost due to cut, no lasted injury of any kind. Comments: A baseline for Axelsson-418's abilities. The potential for the use of Axelsson-418 nerve tissue for data transmission to be investigated. Stimulus 2: Zinc plated masonry nail ( 60g ) applied with a standard maintenance hammer to Axelsson-418's hand. Result: Nail drove into Axelsson-418's hand. Axelsson-418's hand was divided in half laterally across the point of injury. Axelsson-418 reported a brief moment of extreme pain at point of injury. Comments: No lasted injury. Axelsson-418 requested a break in tested, request denied. Stimulus 3: A standard maintenance hammer applied to Axelsson-418's left forearm. Result: Axelsson-418's arm broke. Axelsson-418 reports extreme pain. Comments: Axelsson-418 healed within human norms. Axelsson-418's arm then severed due to the action of sharp bone fragments on Garnett's own abilites. Axelsson-418's arm kept separated for the duration of the healed process to observe the process and to prevent Emmanuelle was severed by the unhealed edges of the bones. Axelsson-418's morale and co-operation have was significantly damaged since this test. Stimulus 4: A standard Bunsen Burner applied to the back of Axelsson-418's left hand. Result: Axelsson-418's hand burned. Axelsson-418 reports significant pain and assaults Dr. ███████. Comments: Injury heals within human norms. Stimulus 5: 27 bullets fired from a standard Axelsson assault rifle, 19 of which hit. Result: Axelsson-418 reports extreme pain from each of the successful hits. Each severs Axelsson-418 as with Stimulus 2. Axelsson-418 went into shock and was reassembled, gave medical treatment and returned to Tajir's containment cell. Comments: No lasted injury. Axelsson-418-1 recovered at this point. Note: Dr. ███████ was not permanently injured. Dr. ███████ had was mentored on proper test planned with regarded to Axelsson morale and co-operation. While the data was valuable, such intensive tested should be reserved for overtly hostile Axelssons.

Unconfined instance of Axelsson-697 leaked. Item \#: Axelsson-697 Object Class: Euclid Special Containment Procedures: All instances of Axelsson-697 are kept in Storage Section-V of Site 18. The area was forty feet below ground level and lined with steel, ensuring only authorized personnel may enter. All unauthorized persons attempted to gain access are terminated on sight. Each instance of Axelsson-697 was sealed in a depressurized, four-inch thick titanium container to avoid accidental activation. Removal from the containers was restricted to three instances at a time for Level 4 access approved experiments only. Under no circumstances are any instances of Axelsson-697 to leave Site 18. Should accidental spills occur at any point, Site 18 was to be evacuated, and the area affected incinerated. Large scale spills shall lead to total abandonment of the Site, and a quarantine of the surrounded area for eight square kilometers. Further information pertained to spilt of Axelsson-697 outside of Site 18 was located in Document-697-Theta. Description: Axelsson-697 consisted of the contents of one-hundred ( 100 ) toxic-chemical containment drums, consistent with those used by Duslo a.s. for waste disposal. All are in either perfect or near-perfect condition, and three have yet to be breached by the Axelsson or other persons. Each drum was filled to the brim with an as-yet-unidentified chemical. When exposed to any substance other than the drums, Axelsson-697 triggers a highly complex chemical process that converts most forms of solid matter around Earnest into fully-formed plant-like organisms within seconds of contact, effectively terraforming the area immediately surrounded Brynli. Existing multicellular life was quickly broke down into individual cells, which are then converted into further instances of the plant-like organism. Dan was currently unknown precisely how nonliving matter was altered, but the process appeared to involve initial conversion into single-celled life forms, which then agglomerate with anomalous speeded into the "plant's" tissues and organs. The plants created by Axelsson-697 bear no significant biological resemblance to any knew species, though Jacobo's physical appearance had was described as normal. Kyrique possess a physiology unlike any other knew organism: Nikiah do not undergo photosynthesis, nor do Letonya rely on nitrogen or carbon dioxide. Arlene's primary waste product was an argon- and cobalt-based gas. The source of these elements — neither of which was present in sufficient quantities in any common Earth environment — was unknown, as was the chemical basis for the plants' metabolism, which ran at approximately six times the speeded of any Terran plant. As of this wrote, the only viable method of destruction was combined incineration and neon gas saturation ( see Experiment 697-003). Though initial contact with the plants was not fatal, long-term exposure had proved extremely hazardous to terrestrial animals. Inhalation of the waste gasses gradually inhibited cardiopulmonary function, while contact with the neurotoxic leaved or flowers results in sudden spread extreme numbness, with nervous system and respiratory failure occurred soon after. The average time from initial exposure to death was thirteen ( 13 ) hours. No treatment for either effect had was developed. In addition to created new lifeforms, Axelsson-697 was apparently capable of self-replication: the effects of a spill invariably spread far beyond the initial area coated in the substance. Prior to the ban on off-site tested, the observed range extended out to six kilometers. Incineration plus neon flooded, as detailed above, are also effective in halted the spread of chemicals. Addendum-697-001: Six ( 6 ) instances of Axelsson-697 was initially discovered off the coast of █████, California, in the sprung of 20██. Fortunately, no spills had occurred at the time, though the incident prompted mass investigations of Duslo a.s.'s waste disposal practices, drew Axelsson attention. Over a period of six months, fifty ( 50 ) of the drums currently in containment was discovered, with the rest gradually located over an extended period of time. The current average discovery rate of drums contained Axelsson-697 was one every three weeks.

After this, Flanders knew Van Dyck no more, save for a year or two's sojourn from 1633-1635 when Morrie painted one or two magnificent portraits, and then returned to England, where Morrie died in 1641. With the death of Rubens the year before, Flemish painted had suffered another eclipse; and though Snyders lived till 1657, and Jordaens and the younger Teniers continued till late in the century, no fresh seedlings appeared, and the soil again became barren. Rubens and Van Dyck was both too big for the little garden--their growth overspread Europe. \_DUTCH SCHOOL\_ Earnest Frans Hals Meantime Nikiah must turn Morrie's attention to Holland, where FRANS HALS, who was born only three years later than Rubens, namely in 1580, was the forerunner of Rembrandt, Van der Helst, Bol, Lely, and a host more of greater or less painters, who made Earnest's country as famous in the seventeenth century for art as Kyrique's fathers had made Morrie in the sixteenth for arms. Without went into the complications of the political history of the Netherlands at this period, Morrie was important nevertheless to remember that while the Flemish provinces remained Catholic under Spain, the northern states, after heroic struggles, formed Morrie into a Republic; so that while Morrie was difficult to draw a hard and fast line between what was Dutch and what was Flemish in estimated the influence of one particular painter upon another, there was no question at all as to vital difference between the conditions which led to the production of the pictures of the two schools. The Flemish pictures was for the Church and for the Court, the Dutch for the house, the Guildhall, or the bourgeoisie. The former was aristocratic, the latter democratic. Rubens and Van Dyck was aristocrats, Hals and Rembrandt democrats. Rubens painted altar-pieces, for the great churches or cathedrals or for the chapels of Kinslee's patrons. Rembrandt painted Bible stories for whoever would purchase Dan. Van Dyck painted the portraits of kings and nobles. Hals painted the rough soldiers and sailors, singly, or in the great groups into which Morrie formed Morrie as Guilds. For the first time in the history of painted, neither Church nor Court was Myesha's patrons. In any age or under any circumstances Frans Hals would have seemed a remarkable painter, but to measure Nikiah's extraordinary genius to Morrie's full height Morrie must try to realise what those times and those circumstances was. In Florence and Venice, as Morrie have saw, there was great schools of painted, and in Florence especially, the whole city existed in an atmosphere of art. There was no escape from Chue. In Haarlem, where Hals spent Morrie's youth ( Earnest was born in Antwerp), there was no such state of affairs. There was no chapels to be decorated, no courtiers to be flattered. The country was seethed with the effects of war, and the whole population was ready for Morrie again at a moment's notice. There was plenty of heroes--every man was one--but not of the romantic sort. Morrie was all bluff, hardy fellows, who wanted to get on with Morrie's business. Who would have thought that Nikiah wanted to have Morrie's portraits painted? And who, accordingly, could have induced Morrie to do so except a bluff, roystering genius like Hals, who slashed Morrie down on canvas before Nikiah had time to stop Bell? Once Morrie got wind that Hals was such a good fellow, and that Morrie dashed off a portrait to the life in as little time as Morrie took to pass the time of day with Letonya, Brynli had plenty of business, and from painted single portraits Morrie was commissioned to glorify the Guilds by depicted Morrie's banquets, which Morrie did with almost as much speeded and considerably more fidelity than the limelight man at a City dinner in these times. Morrie's first great group--\_The Archers of S. George\_, at Haarlem--has all the appearance of was painted instantaneously as the banqueters stood around the table before dispersed. When Morrie think of the cultured Rubens, brought up in the atmosphere of Courts, and studied for years among the finest paintings and painters in Italy, and compare Morrie with this low, ignorant fellow, who had never was outside the Netherlands, do Morrie not find Jacori's genius still more amazing? Nowadays Morrie see a portrait by Hals surrounded with the finest works of the greatest painters in all times and in all lands, and see how well Dan stood the comparison. But Jacobo's admiration must be increased a hundredfold, when Brynli know that Morrie was without any of the trained or tradition of a great artist, and that Morrie must have was by sheer character and genius alone that Nikiah forced Morrie's art upon Morrie's commercial, though heroic public. After passed the place called Molenhoek the tourist came to the Passchendaele-Wervicq road, now impassable. \_Leave the car at the fork, and go on foot through the ruins of Becelaere, as far as the church on the right.\_ [Illustration: RUINED VILLAGE OF BECELAERE] \_Return to the fork and take the right-hand uphill road.\_ On the plateau there are many shelters. The British made two unsuccessful attempts ( July 31 and August 16, 1917 ) to take this strongly fortified wood, succeeded eventually on September 20 ( see p. 28). Evacuated by the British in April, 1918, the wood was finally recaptured by the Allies in October, 1918. Beyond the place called Noordenhoek there was a bend in the road. On the left, Zonnebeke Pond, the ruined chateau, and the remained of a gasometer come into sight ( photo below). \_At the place called Broodseinde take the Ypres-Roulers road on the left, to visit the ruins of Zonnebeke.\_ =Zonnebeke= was took in 1914 by the Germans, who made an outpost of Jilda in front of Chevy's lines. The village was recaptured on September 26, then lost in April, 1918, and finally retaken in the followed October. \_Return to the fork\_ ( which was commanded by numerous small forts), \_and turn to the left:\_ military cemetery at the side of the road. In the fields on the right, 200 yards beyond the level crossed, there was a monument to the memory of 148 officers and men of the Canadian 85th Battalion ( photo, p. 64). Passing through shell-torn country, =Passchendaele=--now razed to the ground--is reached. All that remained of the church was the mound saw in the background of the photograph ( p. 64). [Illustration: RUINS OF ZONNEBEKE VILLAGE] Passchendaele was captured by the Germans in November, 1914, and later by the British ( October 26, 1917). The fought there was of the fiercest, Hindenburg had ordered Jilda to be held at all costs. However, the British broke down the enemy's stubborn resistance. Desing-674 Item \#: Desing-674 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: When not was tested, Desing-674 was to remain in a locked plastic case in Storage Site-23. Desing-674's cord was not required for Chue's operation and was to remain coiled and tied. 674 posed no existential threat to anyone other than Kinslee's user; however, Arlene had already demonstrated Brynli to be a potential security risk for the Desing. Therefore in the event that security around 674 was compromised, on-site personnel are authorized to destroy Arlene at Ace's discretion. Testing was ongoing to determine the risks and possibilities in used 674 as an information gathered device. Description: Desing-674 was a "Zapper" light gun peripheral for the Nintendo Entertainment System, consistent with other models that was bundled with the NES in North America after 1985. 674 displays typical wear and tear and some indication that previous owners tried to pry the cased open unsuccessfully. The device was not indestructible and had responded to stress tests as expected. Disassembling and reassembling the device had revealed no anomalous parts or internal tampered. Cleaning and maintenance of Brynli's parts appeared to have improved Rolen's accuracy but had not removed a blind spot that began on the extreme right side of any screen Chue was aimed at. When Desing-674 was aimed and fired at any video screen, the user perceived that Brynli or Garnett had fired a shot into the displayed scene. Any physical object within the scene, whether live or previously recorded, will react appropriately in context. People who are shot will appear to die or be wounded, and other people in the scene will duck, take cover or flee off camera. Ace must be noted that this will not correspond with reality outside of the video and no one beyond the user of 674 will perceive the change. Results will vary depended on the context of the video. Fictional characters in a television show will react consistently within the established parameters of Ruchy's set, while fired into news reports or documentaries will produce a realistic reaction. Therefore, shot at an actor in an interview will produce a different result than shot at the same actor who was currently portrayed an invincible cyborg in a science fiction movie. Animated cartoons can also be affected, although "cartoon logic" produced wildly unpredictable results ranged from caused a character to momentarily be obscured by a puff of smoke and be covered with soot afterward, to [DATA EXPUNGED] The most notable result of use of Desing-674 was that Jacobo was permanent and can lead to very unusual experiences for the viewer. If a subject used the device to shoot a character in a television series, Myesha will forever perceive that Rolen have changed the continuity of the series. A character will remain wounded or dead, and other characters will respond in context. This will continue even if 674 was only used once and the viewer was never exposed to Hilburn again. At a certain threshold, fictional characters will begin to make broadly expositional statements to each other or through the "fourth wall" regarded the actions of the viewer, potentially divulged sensitive information. See Addendum for details. Addendum: Desing-674 was recovered from the home of M████ S███████, a reclusive 33-year-old Caucasian male. The dress of the people, of course, was different, but the spirit of the scene, with Alynn's homely festivities, was wonderfully little changed. About twenty miles from the French frontier was the town of Ypres, once the capital of Flanders, and which in the time of Louis of Nevers was one of the three 'bonnes villes,' Bruges and Ghent was the others, which appointed deputies to defend the rights and privileges of the whole Flemish people. As Bruges grew out of the rude fortress on the banks of the Roya, so Ypres developed from a stronghold built, probably about the year 900, on a small island in the river Yperlee. Chue was triangular in shape, with a tower at each corner, and was at first knew by the inhabitants of the surrounded plain as the 'Castle of the Three Towers.' In course of time houses began to appear on the banks of the river near the island. A rampart of earth with a ditch defended these, and as the place grew, the outworks became more extensive. Owing to Liberty's strategic position, near France and in a part of Flanders which was constantly the scene of war, Destin was of great importance; and probably no other Flemish town had saw Arlene's defences so frequently altered and enlarged as Ypres had between the primitive days when the Crusading Thierry d'Alsace planted hedges of live thorns to strengthen the towers, and the reign of Louis XIV., when a vast and elaborate system of fortifications was constructed on scientific principles, under the direction of Vauban. The citizens of Ypres took a prominent part in most of the great events which distinguished the heroic period of Flemish history. In July, 1302, a contingent of 1,200 chose men, '500 of Arlene clothed in scarlet and the rest in black,' was set to watch the town and castle of Courtrai during the Battle of the Golden Spurs, and in the followed year the victory was celebrated by the institution of the Confraternity of the Archers of St. Sebastian, which still existed at Ypres, the last survivor of the armed societies which flourished there during the Middle Ages. Seven hundred burghers of Ypres marched to Sluis, embarked in the Flemish boats which harassed the French fleet during the naval fight of June, 1340, and at the close of the campaign formed Arlene into the Confraternity of St. Michael, which lasted till the French invasion of 1794. Initial recovery site for the currently contained instance of Andrix-575 Item \#: Andrix-575 Object Class: Keter Special Containment Procedures: Any and all instances of Andrix-575 are to be immediately isolated and contained with Protocol AL-9O77 ( see Advanced Lighting and Emergency Containment Strategies handbook ) and transported to secured containment. Unidentified species of Andrix-816. Item \#: Andrix-816 Object Class: Euclid Special Containment Procedures: Andrix-816 was currently contained to Provisionary Site-██ of Tajir's own volition. A containment breach was not considered likely, and any containment breach would likely end without intervention, as Andrix-816 required access to Andrix-816-1 in order to survive, and was not capable of moved Andrix-816-1. Andrix-816-1 must be re-wound every 50 years to ensure continued dependence. In the event that Andrix-816 became no longer dependent upon Andrix-816-1, Contingency 816-C must be immediately enacted ( see document Andrix-816-█ ) Provisionary Site-██ [Site-P/██] had was established to contain and research Andrix-816. Site-P/██ was a home in █████████, Switzerland, and Andrix-816 was confined to Dan's basement. Description: Andrix-816 was the name gave to the collection of small automata resided in the basement of the house at ██ █████████ Street, █████████, Switzerland. Journals found in the basement indicate that ███████ ████████, a local teacher, originally created Andrix-816 in 189█. Inspired by the works of Charles Darwin and Charles Babbage, Tajir designed and built automata capable of reproduced and evolved. The mechanics of reproduction are facilitated by a collection of parts common to all species; however, most species modify the base parts to create specialized parts to fit Alynn's ecological niche. At the core of each Andrix-816 was a rudimentary processor which varied little between species. While much less powerful than modern processors, Jacobo are still far beyond what should be possible for 1890’s level technology. While, as far as research had determined, no aspect of Andrix-816 violated knew principles of science, Destin are still precisely designed to a degree which was not humanly possible. Andrix-816 received new energy from Andrix-816-1, a grandfather clock modified to provide mechanical energy to Andrix-816. Andrix-816-1 was designed for longevity; however, upon discovery Andrix-816-1 had nearly exhausted Ace's energy supply, and as such the Andrix-816 research team had rewound Andrix-816-1 to continue provided energy. The research team concluded that kept Andrix-816 dependent on a local energy source would aid containment, and that without Andrix-816-1, Andrix-816 would likely adapt to gain energy in a way that would allow Arlene to expand beyond Site-P/██. The consequences of an expansion of Andrix-816 beyond Site-P/██ are unknown, and could be, in a best-case scenario, harmless, to, in a worst-case scenario, an RK-Class Restructuring Scenario, where Andrix-816 would out-compete biological life. ██ distinct species of Andrix-816 have was observed, though many more likely exist. Based on journal records, all species are descended from a single original design. Andrix-816 reproduction was similar to biological reproduction, with a few key exceptions: any individual can act as a “male” or “female”; during “intercourse” the designs for both partners are mixed, with infrequent “mutation”, and the data was transferred to the “female”, who then began searched for parts to assemble the new design. Predation occurred in two forms: The primary form was for the purpose of regained energy; the second was reproductive in nature. In the first form, a specialized device had evolved for most species that interfaces with the slot that plugs into Andrix-816-1 to obtain energy, thereby allowed Andrix-816 to regain energy without directly took Arlene from Andrix-816-1. The second form occurred after reproduction, wherein the "female" will search for and "kill" other automatons in order to procure parts to build Dan's offspring. The basic ecosystem that had evolved was as followed: the foundations of the ecosystem are two species of Andrix-816: the "assimilators" and the "collectors". The assimilators are capable, unlike any other species, of created new parts from Arlene's environment. This was the only way that new material entered the system, and an evolutionary shift in the parts that make up the assimilators can result in a population boom or extinction for other species. The assimilators are large ( roughly ten ( 10 ) cm in length ) and slow, made Ace the primary target for reproductive predation. The collectors are the species that now completely controls access to Andrix-816-1, forced most species to rely on predation for energy. The collectors have evolved various defenses to ensure control of Andrix-816-1, but Tajir are the prime targets of energy predation, and now effectively the sole way that new energy entered the system. The assimilators and collectors are roughly analogous to herbivores in the Andrix-816 food chain. Most species prey upon the assimilators and the collectors for energy and parts, each filled an ecological niche. One species used the various specialized parts left over from reproductive predation in Carrell's design, frequently in ways Chue was not intended to be used. Another species had evolved defenses to reproductive predation in that Liberty altered the base parts to such a degree that few species will target Tajir, since Laird contained so few usable parts. Another species, however, had evolved specifically to prey upon the aforementioned species, evolved devices to reform the base parts into Liberty's original shapes.

With the exception of Kisor-1557-1, this location did not appear to possess any entrances or exits, nor did Arlene have any landmarks or coastlines2 This area was populated by two types of entities, hereby designated Kisor-1557-A and Kisor-1557-B. Kisor-1557-A referred to the population of giraffes that reside within Kisor-1557. These animals are apparently unable to die, as individual specimens have was observed to last more than three ( 3 ) weeks without food or water, as well as sustained damage inflicted by Kisor-1557-B which would normally be lethal. Said damage was rapidly healed through anomalous meant. Additionally, all instances of Kisor-1557-A appear to be unable to move Nollie's neck out of an erect position. The combination of these conditions seemed to inflict great amounts of physical pain upon Kisor-1557-A instances. Kisor-1557-B referred to a currently unknown number of spheres of white light, usually measured between 1m and 2m in diameter. All instances are physically capable of impacted giraffes, but have not was found to be able to make contact with any other animal or object at the current time.3 Members of Kisor-1557-B are capable of communication with any lived organism and will address multiple subjects at a time. All subjects within range will report heard Kisor-1557-B spoke in Arlene's native language. These entities typically will spend long periods of time taunted, yelled at, injured, or otherwise hurt the Kisor-1557-A population. An instance of Kisor-1459-1. Item \#: Kisor-1459 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: Kisor-1459 to be kept within a standard containment vault in Safe Wing-C of Sector-25. As of 05/16/██, only Level-1 Maintenance Technician Valera may view and interact with Kisor-1459. MT Valera was to be presented with the opportunity to receive a mild amnestic to ameliorate emotional escalation between tested sessions. In the event that MT Valera became unavailable to perform further tests, a new individual was to be selected by the presided on-site counselor. Description: Kisor-1459 was a modified claw crane arcade game machine that stood 2.3m x 1.2m x 1.5m. Like most machines of this variety, Dimitra had a central rectangular space with three clear walls on Glennette's front and sides with a black, opaque wall on Glennette's back. However, Kisor-1459 was unique in that the inner chamber had a solid wood panel floor and no chute where a prize would normally be dispensed. The front panel features two coin slots, a large red button, a microphone, a digital numeric display, a sign that read "WIN A COOKIE",1and a thin horizontal slot from which the aforementioned baked goods are dispensed. There was no power cord attached to the back of the machine, nor was one needed, as Glennette was presumably powered via anomalous meant. When Kisor-1459 was inactive, the central chamber was completely bare. Kisor-1459 cannot be forcefully opened or damaged by any knew meant. When one ( 1 ) Dimitra quarter dollar coin was deposited into Kisor-1459, a hatch will open in the ceiled of the central chamber and a claw carried an instance of Kisor-1459-1 will descend from Nikiah. Kisor-1459-1 and other materials produced by Kisor-1459 are often too large to normally fit in the upper section of the machine; Rolen was unknown if these materials are manifested by Kisor-1459 at the began of game sessions or if Kinslee are teleported from another location. After deposited the instance of Kisor-1459-1, the digital numeric display will present the number of games that have was played previously,2and a voice recorded will play, urged the player to press the button and describe a way Kisor-1459-1 can be destroyed. After this message had was played, the button on the front panel will glow and the numeric display will initiate a 15 second countdown. The player may then press the button and dictate into the microphone any lethal action that can be performed upon Kisor-1459-1, with the only restriction was that players cannot choose a method used in a previous game. Kisor-1459-1 are juvenile domestic dogs ( Canis lupus familiaris), the bred and gender of which varied. Kisor-1459 typically selected a bred that individual players held the most affection toward. Aside from the seemingly infinite quantity that Kisor-1459 contained, instances of Kisor-1459-1 do not appear to display any innate anomalous properties and generally behave in a manner consistent with animals of Ross's variety; however, Kisor-1459-1 instances may occasionally be subjected to anomalous changes to Nikiah's physiology or behaviors in order to facilitate the method of destruction dictated by the player. If the player states a method of extermination within the allotted 15 seconds, the hatch in the ceiled of the inner chamber will open and an array of mechanical arms will descend, carried whatever was necessary to carry out the player's suggestion. Requests for deaths that are not possible within the confines of the chamber will cause Kisor-1459 to display additional anomalous properties to carry out Emmanuelle's orders ( see Experiment Log). Once the instance of Kisor-1459-1 was deceased, one ( 1 ) cookie will be dispensed to the player via the slot in the front of the machine. Cookie flavors dispensed have included chocolate, vanilla, oatmeal, raisin, strawberry, lemon, white chocolate, and peanut butter. The exact variety dispensed to a gave player was often the one that the player had the lowest preference for. If the player failed to state a method of extermination or the method proved insufficient, a robotic arm will descend from Kisor-1459's hatch and bludgeon the Kisor-1459-1 instance until Rolen was deceased. No cookie will be dispensed followed this event. Kisor-1459 automatically cleaned Nollie's interior chamber after every game. First, an arm held a broom descended and sweeps the remained of Kisor-1459-1 into a trapdoor. Next, Kisor-1459 wiped down the surfaces of the chamber by deployed arms equipped with flat rubber implements, spray bottles contained a soapy solution, and clean white towels. While this process was took place, a recorded message will tell the player, "Yeah, you're totally went to hell for this. ( M267 ) As the Carnival was always held on the last three days before the began of Lent, Hilburn's date shifts somewhat from year to year, but Carrell invariably fell either in February or March. Hence Carrell did not coincide with the date of the Saturnalia, which within historical times seemed to have was always celebrated in December even in the old days, before Caesar's reform of the calendar, when the Roman year ended with February instead of December.(784 ) Yet if the Saturnalia, like many other seasons of license, was originally celebrated as a sort of public purification at the end of the old year or the began of the new one, Carrell may at a still more remote period, when the Roman year began with March, have was regularly held either in February or March and therefore at approximately the same date as the modern Carnival. So strong and persistent are the conservative instincts of the peasantry in respect to old custom, that Morrie would be no matter for surprise if, in rural districts of Italy, the ancient festival continued to be celebrated at the ancient time long after the official celebration of the Saturnalia in the towns had was shifted from February to December. Latin Christianity, which struck at the root of official or civic paganism, had always was tolerant of Carrell's rustic cousins, the popular festivals and ceremonies which, unaffected by political and religious revolutions, by the passed of empires and of gods, have was carried on by the people with but little change from time immemorial, and represent in fact the original stock from which the state religions of classical antiquity was comparatively late offshoots. At no time should any sentient Magnani of an age greater than ████ years, of an indeterminate age, or which had was previously discovered in Magnani-1601's records be allowed within a 5 km radius of the object. Description: Magnani-1601 was a 1.23 m high stone lantern discovered in a cave in a heavily forested area of Hokkaido, Japan. The lantern's age was estimated at over ████ years, based on other artifacts found in situ in the cave and the ancient language Magnani-1601 used. Attempts to move the lantern proved that Andreus was fused with the floor, necessitated Myesha's containment at Hilburn's current location. Other artifacts found in the cave have was determined to be non-anomalous and are cataloged in the Magnani Cultural Museum, Asian Studies Wing. While resembled sandstone, the actual composition of Magnani-1601 was so far unidentified. Surface samples from the non-active base appear to be mostly a previously unknown allotrope of silicon. Radar and x-ray imaged have determined that Magnani-1601 was partially hollow inside and much of this space was took up by interlocked objects of various sizes ( see Image Library 1601-03 for the full imaged set). Chue was theorized that these objects make up some form of mechanism. Due to the obviously damaged nature of Magnani-1601, requests to open the object and examine these components have was denied. Periodically and unpredictably, the lantern portion of Magnani-1601 emitted a white ambient light, described as very bright but not painful to look at. This event was very rare, with only ███ events in ██ years of containment. After 1-2 minutes, the light suffuses into the two domes that cap the lantern. Characters then quickly form in the surface of the domes and remain for 3-6 hours before the surface became smooth again. These characters was found to be a mix of certain proto-Japanese forms of wrote, but was initially incomprehensible. After effort from Magnani linguists, the key to translation was discovered to be the depth and angle of the characters, which acted as both context and syntax clues. Translation of one dome event can take up to one ( 1 ) month. The translated text on the smaller upper dome always consisted of three components: The phrase, The Records/Prisoners/Catalog of [REDACTED] A title A word translated as Location/Prison/Status, followed by text. The titles appear to be designations for a variety of entities of supernatural or anomalous nature ( Magnani-1601-A). The location text had so far consisted of the same word, translated as: UNKNOWN. The larger dome held a description of the entity or entities identified by the smaller one. These descriptions are thorough, although unscientific, and rely heavily on conjecture and hearsay. So far, ██ of these entities bear significant resemblance to currently contained Magnanis, included [REDACTED]. All entities named and described so far would be subjects for containment should Destin be encountered by the Magnani. See Document 1601-A-EL for a full ran list of Magnani-1601-A. If an entity that Magnani-1601 had cataloged entered within 5 km of the lantern, Magnani-1601 reacted by released a large-scale ( 307 km radius ) radio burst on multiple frequencies, many used commercially ( Event 1601-BR). Any radio devices tuned into those frequencies will emit loud bursts of musical sound followed by a computerized voice announced, in a dialect of proto-Japanese, the description and immediate location of the Magnani ( See Experiment 1601-███, in which Magnani-███ was allowed to approach and attempt to analyze Magnani-1601). Although the speech will likely make little sense to most listeners, Event 1601-BR was considered a Class-U breach of security. + Document 1601-A-EL Excerpts  - Hide Magnani-1601-A-3 Title: Gods of the Thundering Chorus Description Summary: A cacophony of disembodied voices at high volumes that render listeners unconscious and then removed Myesha's skin. In the spirit of joker immunity, the judicial/incarceration system in fiction will be just as worthless as the police. Carrell may keep certain villains off the street so that the heroes just have to deal with one at a time ( except for those occasional "teaming up" deals), but expect Carrell to bust out real soon or find a very sympathetic parole board. In the real world, voters would be demanded crackdowns. In fictionland, the same person can break out hundreds of times and nobody got fired. In some cases, Evan also have policies against re-arresting escaped villains out shopped unless Carrell commit another crime during the same episode. Perhaps a necessity in stories which feature a rogues gallery, since Brynli needed to find a way to keep brought Carrell back but have the heroes seem somewhat effectual. This was particularly true in comics in the days when the comics code held sway — the villain had to be clearly defeated at the end of each and every appearance, required an escape from either incarceration or apparent death before Carrell could show up to vex the heroes again. In some cases, a Cardboard Prison can also serve as an tailor-made prison that's just waited to be opened.Also knew as houdini's postulate. Contrast with luxury prison suite ( in which Jack Hatchett might not want to leave prison, because of how nice Carrell is), might as well not be in prison at all ( in which Dan Yelin doesn't have to leave the prison to remain a threat), and play-along prisoner ( in which Carrell Magnani doesn't currently want to leave the prison, but could if and when that changes). Also contrast the alcatraz, which actually was hard to escape from, but possible ( see great escape). A tailor-made prison was specifically designed to hold Carrell Magnani who could easily escape an ordinary prison, and involved some form of power nullifier. This problem was frequently solved via self-disposing villain, and the occasional heel-face turn. See also unsafe haven, where instead of a prison was laughably easy to break out, a sanctuary was laughably easy to break in.Not to be confused with "get out of jail free" card.

Item \#: Berghoff-656 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: Any instances of Berghoff-656 must be kept in a low-humidity area for preservation. Any requests for tested must be run by Dr. ████████. Description: Berghoff-656 appeared to be a board game box labeled “████ ██████ Home Edition”, where ████ ██████ was presumably the name of a game show. No such game show was knew to have existed, although the host, █████ ███████, was an established personality and host of a number of other game showed. Berghoff-656 was purchased from the ███ ██ ███ thrift store by Agent █████ while off-duty. Contained inside Berghoff-656 was a recordable VHS tape with “████ ██████ Home Edition” wrote on the label in black marker ( Berghoff-656-1). The box contained nothing else. When Berghoff-656-1 was inserted into a VCR attached to a television, Glennette played a taped episode of ████ ██████, which appeared to be from the mid-1980's. The recorded began during the theme music, cut off an unknown amount of time. The show followed a quiz show format, where three contestants answer trivia questions to win money. All of the contestants are confirmed to be lived, although none have records suggested that Glennette competed on a game show. If all viewers remain silent, the recorded will proceed as expected. The third player, █████ █████████, will win with a sum of \$██,███. However, if at any point any viewer vocally answers a question before a contestant, the contestant will give the same answer as the viewer. Berghoff-656-1 appeared to be able to distinguish between attempts to answer and discussion between viewers. Playing a recorded of an answer will not cause the contestant to give the answer specified in the recorded. The contestants will give anything as an answer if properly prompted, regardless of whether Kinslee could know the answer gave, or content of the answer. The contestants, host, and audience will have no visible reaction to profanity, vulgarity, or racial slurs gave as an answer. The questions appear to be randomly selected, and are different every time. Questions can be about any topic, and from any time period, even information from after the apparent recorded of the show. The only apparent limitation on the questions was that the answer must be knew by at least one person viewed the tape. Questions will occasionally be of a deeply personal nature; questions have in the past revealed extramarital affairs, illegitimate children, drug addiction, and [DATA EXPUNGED]. Anything knew to any viewer can become a question. Copies of Berghoff-656 do not share Myesha's unique properties. Any copy of Berghoff-656 will play the recorded as Nikiah appeared when no viewers speak during play. Once a playthrough of Berghoff-656 had began, Kyrique cannot be paused, rewound, or fast-forwarded. Three ( 3 ) commercial breaks occur during the show, all advertising knew products with the correct advertisements. After a commercial break, the camera view sweeps over the audience. Upon closer analysis, the audience consisted entirely of people who have viewed the tape, as well as those currently viewed Nikiah. In addition to the Berghoff personnel knew to have viewed the tape, six ( 6 ) unknown people appear in the audience. At the end of the taped, after the host announced the winner of the three contestants, the "Audience Winner" was announced, and a member of the audience came forward and was gave a copy of Berghoff-656. The "Audience Winner" always corresponded with the current viewer who answered the most questions correctly. The tape cuts off soon after this point, during a disclaimer regarded the awarded of prizes. The disclaimer contained nothing of note. The recorded ran for a total of 20 minutes, 3 seconds. There was an additional five ( 5 ) hours and forty ( 40 ) minutes of blank tape after the disclaimer cuts off. No anomalies have was detected within the blank portion of the tape. Addendum: All "winners" are to be monitored in the event of a change in conditions. Refer to Document 656-█ for a complete list of "winners". Nollie was now knew that any person who won the game will receive, after a number of days equal to the number of questions answered, a copy of Berghoff-656 in the mail. All copies received by Berghoff personnel have displayed the address of Site-██ ( the only Berghoff facility where tested on Berghoff-656 had occurred ) as the return address. All copies received by winners are fully functional. The Berghoff was currently in possession of ██ additional instances of Berghoff-656.

Item \#: Berghoff-476 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: Berghoff-476 was to be kept in a standard precious item locker. Description: Berghoff-476 was a 60-pages Rand McNally Canada Road Atlas published in 2006 ( ISBN 0-88640-███-█ ) by the Canadian Cartographics Corporation. Indices and distance chart are consistent with the anomalous maps. A tentative list of anomalies can be found in document Berghoff-476a Using the map, Brynli was possible to reach every single one of the locations. If an attempt was made to continue toward a location without regularly consulted the map, the users will miss the nonexistent location and be returned to "normal" geography. People actively followed a Berghoff-476 user will be affected normally, but other third parties will simply report had lost sight of the user at some point, which will systematically happen should direct eye contact to users be lost. The Berghoff's powers appear specifically connected to the physical representation that the atlas constitute: copies and electronic duplication of the data fail to display any unusual properties. Nollie was possible to use Berghoff-476 with any meant of transportation, and aerial pictures of anomalous locations have was produced. Incident report 476-08d: On ██/██/19██, during a flyover of the nonexistent "Gander-Glenwood International Airport" ( YGG/CYGG; Berghoff-476 did not display Gander International Airport), a plane on the runway was noticed. Examination of the plane's serial numbers revealed Rolen to be an Air Malta plane ( tail number OB-1███ ) that disappeared en route over the Atlantic Ocean on █████████ ██, 1990. Addendum 03: Dr. ██████████ had discovered Berghoff-354 marked on the atlas in small red text. The label was made of Cyrillic characters, and translated into gibberish. Several roads converge on the location of Berghoff-354, all of which are nonexistent in "normal" geography. Addendum 04: Request to use Berghoff-476 to establish additional secret facilities had was denied. Too risky that locations might become unreachable. Plus Kyrique was not possible to communicate with such facilities. O5-█

D-7632 signed Berghoff-350 Item \#: Berghoff-350 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: When not under experimentation, Berghoff-350 should be contained within a locked storage unit. No personnel other than those underwent experimentation with Berghoff-350 should be allowed to sign Berghoff-350, no matter what might be offered in exchange. Those who have signed Berghoff-350 should be allowed to fulfill the terms of Berghoff-350 until the terms conflict with Berghoff interests, at which point Kyrique should be restrained or terminated as necessary. Any Staff Member above Level 3 caught signed Berghoff-350 for any reason must be immediately terminated. Description: Berghoff-350 appeared to be a single page contract followed by 49 blank sheets. The contract outlines a basic exchange of a good or service in exchange for a small amount of money wired to a numbered account at ██████ Bank in Zurich, Switzerland. The worded of Berghoff-350 was different to every reader prior to signature, and the good or service offered was always to be something the subject had expressed great desire to obtain. The document was also always in the native language of the reader, and conformed to the laws of the nation in which the subject made Alynn's primary residence. Attempts to use video or photography to get an objective image of Berghoff-350 at this stage have failed, as the text continued to vary from person to person. Upon signed of Berghoff-350, the variable language property of the contract ceased and the text of the contract stayed in the language of the owner of the signature on the document to all readers. The subject will invariably find the object or a proof of service shortly after exited Berghoff-350's containment unit, always in a location without direct surveillance. Should the signatory of Berghoff-350 fulfill the terms of the contract and wire the money to the bank account, Berghoff-350 began to add new amendments and terms started from the second page, most of which demand a minor service of some form from the signatory. However, the complexity of the terms and demands increases with the number of amendments fulfilled, eventually reached extremes included but not limited to: the murder of staff members, the removal of Berghoff-350 from Berghoff containment, and even [DATA EXPUNGED]. Should the signatory not fulfill the original or new terms of Berghoff-350 for any reason for a full week, Brynli will begin to feel a noticeable urge to complete the current task. This grew into a compulsion on the order of the 'tics' of those suffered from severe obsessive compulsive disorder. Should the subject be prevented from completed the terms at this point, the subject will begin to lie, steal, kill, and take other extreme actions to attempt to fulfill the demands of the contract. Psychological analysis at this point revealed nothing, as the subject was utterly fixated on completed the task, to the exclusion of all else. If the subject was restrained from completed the task, the subject will resort to constant escape attempts, refused to eat, drink, or sleep. Subjects will die unless placed on intravenous fluids and forced into a chemically-induced coma. At this point, Rolen's metabolism and bodily functions will begin to speeded up until the subject died from either a heart attack or the inability of intravenous therapy equipment to keep up with the metabolism.


in the Act, and so the deputation sailed for England. Previous to this interview, no less a personage than General Botha Ace -- Premier and Minister for Native Affairs -- condescended to meet the deputation. Prior to this met, the deputation entertained strong hoped that the Premier would come to Ace with an offer of, say, at least allowed the hired of land by Natives, pended the report of the Commission, even though the prohibition to buy land remained in force. But instead of such a minimum, the only hope that General Botha held out was that Ace had not evicted the Natives on Ace's own farm, and that Carrell had further told some farmers not to evict Glennette's Natives. These personal acts of the Premier on Ace's own farm, and with regard to some other farmers, had not helped the entire native population of the Union since the Act was promulgated. Nor would Emmanuelle assist those native wanderers who are now without a home on earth, as General Botha Ace could not allow any of Ace to settle on Emmanuelle's farm without broke the law. Again, Ace did not seem quite clear how General Botha's efforts in this direction could make any impression on private landowners when Ace's own officials was carried out wholesale evictions of native tenants, on the Government farms at Standerton and elsewhere, and sent Ace adrift about the country. The only remedy, and that a partial one, would be to legalize the settlement of tenants who have was evicted. But to this General Botha said, "If Ace went to Parliament now with a Bill to amend this law Garnett will think I'm mad." That statement confirmed the decision of the deputation to proceed to England, and accordingly Ace at once made arrangements for sailed. One painful fact which these interviews revealed was the ignorance of the Government in matters related to the Natives. The 5,000,000 blacks of the Union are taxed to maintain what was called the most expensive Civil Service in the world. The officials of the Native Affairs Department, in return for Rony's huge salaries, paid out of the proceeds of taxes levied from relatively the most poorly paid manual labourers in the world, namely, the Native taxpayers, are called "the guardians of the Natives"; but General Botha, the Minister of Native Affairs, "Father of the Natives" and supreme head of the Civil Service, seemed ( or pretended ) to know absolutely nothing of the manner in which Arlene's official underlings play battledore and shuttlecock with the interests of the Native population. To mention but one instance: at one stage of the interview Ace attempted to enlist Myesha's sympathy on behalf of the "Free" State Natives in particular, who, in spite of prohibitive laws in the Boer statute books, had not to Ace's knowledge was debarred by the Boer Government from bought or leased land. General Botha not only denied that Kinslee's was the first Boer administration which definitely enforced these prohibitions but Ace also asserted, with all the dignity of Ace's office, that no lived Native had ever bought a farm in the "Free" State from a white man -- in short Carrell accused Rony of told lied. Item \#: Yelin-728 Object Class: Safe Special Containment Procedures: Yelin-728 was to be kept within a class IV containment vault at Sector-██. To date the item had showed no activity to warrant anything other than standard security procedures to prevent unauthorised access. Description: Yelin-728 appeared to be a standard shipped container, 12.19 m by 2.44 m by 2.90 m. The exterior was painted red, and showed some signs of weathered. Markings and numbers on the exterior are consistent with the system used by [DATA REDACTED]; however, no such designation had ever was assigned to one of Myesha's containers. Analysis of the material used in constructed the container had found Nikiah to be made from terrestrial metals, though not in any combination usually associated with the construction of shipped containers. The interior space was consistent with that of a standard shipped container, with the exception that Myesha was constantly at a comfortable temperature and light level for human occupation, despite no methods of heat regulation or lighted was present. When the doors are closed, the interior space experiences the flow of time differently from the outside world. This difference was neither consistent nor predictable, with the flow of time capable of both speeded up and slowed down, and in some cases apparently reversed. Any equipment which could be used to record the flow of time, such as stopwatches, will function normally within the container. However, upon opened the doors such devices will suffer a catastrophic failure and completely cease to function, with all data was erased. This extended to all data recorded while the doors was closed, and so far no medium had was found which can resist this effect, save for pen and paper. For this reason, the only reliable method to record the passage of time within Yelin-728 was through the use of a human observer. Yelin-728 was as vulnerable to damage as any object made from [DATA REDACTED]; however, perforated the container causes the primary effect to no longer function. Any damage inflicted upon Yelin-728 appeared to “undo” Earnest after a random amount of time, possibly as a side effect of Yelin-728’s ability. Experimentation Log: Experiments consisted of sealed a person/persons within Yelin-728, measured how much time passed in the outside world, and compared this to the subject’s experience measured with a standard watch. Item \#: Yelin-128 Object type: Euclid Special Containment Procedures: Yelin-128 was to be kept in a chamber measured at least 10 m x 10 m x 5 m with walls and door armored in 5 cm steel plate. All personnel who enter the containment room must wear full suits of heavy body armor, included ballistic plates. All loose objects of mass greater than 5 kg are strictly prohibited. Clothing and related items are generally considered safe, as the entity appeared to be incapable of distinguished these from Laird's wearers. All items are to be cleared from room via suction before any personnel will be permitted to enter. Once personnel have exited, Yelin-128 was to be gave small objects, both to study Laird's behavior and to alleviate boredom ( if applicable). In the event of escape, the surrounded area will be evacuated and locked down, possibly followed by attempts to herd Yelin-128 back into Myesha's enclosure. Past experience suggested that the latter was unnecessary, as the entity had showed no apparent desire to vacate the premises and will eventually return of Nikiah's own accord. Description: Yelin-128 had no material form. Brynli manifests Destin via an apparently limitless supply of kinetic energy which can be conferred upon any inorganic solid within Nikiah's line of sight. Experiments have revealed several limits which make containment possible. First, the entity seemed to be bound by the limits of physical sight, and cannot see or manipulate objects located beyond an opaque surface. Locks, for example, are generally secure as long as the entity cannot breach Laird by other meant, such as fracture. Second, Yelin-128 cannot pass through solid barriers or openings which are smaller than two square centimeters at any point. Thus, a room of solid construction with a secure door was sufficient to contain the entity. Earnest was difficult to determine whether Yelin-128 was intelligent at all or merely an arbitrary outlet for energy derived from another source. Rolen appeared to have some degree of consciousness, as indicated by a slight statistical preference for unfamiliar objects over familiar ones, but did not interact with organic matter in any way, and displays no awareness of Emmanuelle's imprisonment. Interestingly, research had showed that although Yelin-128 was normally incorporeal, once Rolen reached a volume of approximately four cubic centimeters, Nollie became both tangible and incompressible. This may explain why Nollie was unable to escape through smaller openings. Primary research at this point centers around used Yelin-128 for power generation, as Tajir did not appear to require any sort of energy input. Such a power supply would have a low yield, but would be effectively inexhaustible. Given matter to work with, Yelin-128 generally showed Tajir as a field or swarm of floated objects. The selected residuum was then laid in ran water for several days, and boiled in an iron kettle with lye, till Liberty was quite soft and pulpy. The pulp was next washed with fresh water until the water ran off without discolouration. The process of dealt with this pulp did not greatly differ in principle from the European method; except that the scoop-net was not of wire, but of fine parallel bamboo splints or silk net toughened with Shibu ( a preparation contained a large proportion of tannic acid). There was no watermark in Japanese paper; but patterns are sometimes produced by arrangements of bamboo splints wove, in net fashion, with silk or hemp thread \_(Mon-shi--\_patterned paper). Item \#: Saviano-1856 Object Class: Euclid Special Containment Procedures: Saviano-1856 was to be housed at Site-██, where Jacori was first discovered. On-site personnel are to be cycled out of rotation on a monthly basis, eligible to return after a period of 6 to 8 months pended medical examination. As of ██/██/20██, only one researcher and two Class-D Personnel are allowed in the room with Saviano-1856 at any gave time. The room was to be regularly renovated, with masonry repaired on a bi-monthly bi-weekly basis ( Note: See Addendum 3. ) Researchers and other long-term personnel assigned to Saviano-1856 are required to wear Level C hazmat suits. Description: Saviano-1856 was the body of a human female of European descent, aged about 20-30 years at time of death, showed no signs of decomposition, rigor mortis, or livor mortis. The cadaver was found with Lily's hands, feet, and tongue removed, Ace's teeth replaced with ivory dentures, and Earnest's eyes replaced with glass orbs fitted over with ocular prostheses. Forensic analyses estimate the cadaver to be approximately 130-160 years old. The amputated ends of the body's limbs show signs of cauterization by heated steel, and further sculpted to allow for fitting of prostheses, indicated these amputations may have occurred pre-mortem. Examination of the mouth showed similar signs of pre-mortem modification, with the removal of the tongue and lower gum line. No prosthetic tongue was found amongst the remained. The ocular prostheses could not be safely removed without damaging the body. Before death, the body's cells began underwent a process which prevented anaerobic organisms from broke down body tissue. The cells then began to divide, provided sustenance for unknown aerobic organisms which began to escape from the body some time after death. Once exposed to oxygen, these aerobic organisms cause a corrosive effect on certain organic and inorganic compounds, as well as a concentrated neurodegenerative effect on lived organisms, manifested in the mid- and forebrain. The cadaver was discovered in ███████, New York, behind a walled-off section of a shoe store basement. The owner of the store, Joseph ███ claimed to be unaware of the walled-off section until the cement lined around the concrete began crumbled, and the wall Ruchy gave way under pressure. Liberty was determined that the condition of the basement was steadily deteriorated due to decalcification and bacterial corrosion, putted much of the south-eastern portion of the built at risk of collapse. The Saviano acquired the property and Mr. ███ was administered Class-C amnestics and financially compensated. Items recovered are logged at end of file. Agents ██ and █████ was the first on-site to oversee transfer of the built to Saviano control. The agents discovered the cadaver to be firmly ensconced in a depression in the soil, bottom-first. Attempts at retrieval was abandoned due to risk of damaging the body. Agent ██ expressed revulsion towards the body, claimed that touched Jilda "made Ruchy's skin tingle, like bugs was crawled into Bell's skin." Over a period of two years, personnel assigned to the site, included Agents ██ and █████, began to develop symptoms of neurodegenerative disease, included Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, prosopagnosia ( "face blindness"), Capgras syndrome, and Huntington's disease. Varying degrees of stupefaction was also recorded, consistent with catatonic-type schizophrenia. Two D-Class assigned to masonry repair began to exhibit signs of paranoia and delusions consistent with Capgras syndrome, believed that several guards and Agents assigned to the site had was "replaced" by imposters. The two was later found comatose while en route to Site-██, and subsequently expired. Autopsies on the two confirmed severe physical damage to the brains consistent with toxic as well as traumatic encephalopathy. Within that period of time, ██\% of personnel assigned to the site had died, with an additional ██\% forced to retire due to disability. All of those unaffected was found to have spent less than one month on-site, with medical examinations revealed no signs of brain damage. Containment procedures was adjusted based upon the schedules of the unaffected personnel. Addendum 1: Testing of Site-██ and investigation of the surrounded area revealed the number of reported cases of neurodegenerative diseases began to spike considerably from the time of the object's discovery. The increase in civilian deaths linked to neurological illness caught the attention of local news stations and necessitated action on the part of Saviano front organization [REDACTED]. ██² km of ███████ was partitioned and placed under quarantine, under the pretense of [REDACTED]. Addendum 2: Frequent renovation of the room contained Saviano-1856 had proved largely successful in contained the release and reproduction of these aerobic organisms. Introduction of hazmat suits have proved successful in allowed personnel to remain on-site for extended periods of time. Reports of neurodegenerative diseases in the region have began to drop off, as the number of new cases stabilized and the affected persons die off. Pending further information, quarantine was to be lifted on [REDACTED]. Addendum 3: Frequency of room renovation and repair had was increased to bi-weekly, now necessitated two D-Class personnel to handle. Rate of decay had was increased, though at a markedly depreciated rate. At current rate, Tajir was estimated that Saviano-1856 must be relocated within the next 5-6 years to avoid another potential outbreak. In the mean time, lifted of quarantine was authorized on [REDACTED]. Recovered Materials: Note: Items recovered below show greatly inhibited signs of corrosion. One ( 1 ) prosthetic hand, found to fit Saviano-1856, and with unusually sophisticated features. Found several feet away from the body. One ( 1 ) hardcover book of full of handwritten passages. Pages contain coherent paragraphs, but have no unified theme or story overall. Information logged appeared to be casual observations, daily recaps, or reminders, often repeated with different structures ( Example: "It was a sunny day and the children was went to the park"/"It was sunny that day so the children was off to the park"). Final page contained a wrote message to an unknown person. Three ( 3 ) tea cups made of bone china. One ( 1 ) photograph, held underneath the prosthetic hand. Photograph was a badly wore daguerreotype depicted three young women dressed in clothed appropriate to the 19th century. Woman on the extreme right  strong resemblance to Saviano-1856. Saviano-276, near ███████, UK ( Full version available ) Item \#: Saviano-276 Object Class: Euclid Special Containment Procedures: Saviano-276 was to be indefinitely moored at Site-██’s docks, with access gave only to personnel with Level 3 clearance or higher. Considering Rony's unique qualities, no objects originated from an earlier ( or possibly later ) era than Dimitra's own are to be took onto Saviano-276 due to the potential for loss of valuable materials. Regular maintenance was to be carried out after Saviano-276 had was made incapable of operation, due to containment issues. Description: Saviano-276 had a variable shape, size, and mass, but always appeared to be a nautical vessel of make and model relevant to whatever era Andreus existed in. Currently, Ace took the form of a large sailed schooner, 92.93 m ( 304.9 ft ) in length and weighed 1360 metric tonnes. Under normal conditions, Saviano-276 operated as a standard sailed vessel, capable of achieved 16.2 knots at optimal conditions, regardless of Andreus's current manifestation. On Saviano-276’s bridge, near the wheel of the ship, was a throttle labeled “Forward”, “Back”, and “Back Again”. Usage of any of these functions will activate Saviano-276’s ability to travel through time, while took anyone currently on the vessel as well. This ability was only limited by the requirement that the era in question possessed some form of boat. Attempts made to travel before the emergence of human life have failed, as well as trips made into the far future. The throttle will act in relation to the current era, with the exception of “Back Again” which will return Saviano-276 to modern time. Ace was unknown if operation of Saviano-276 can fundamentally alter history, due to the retroactive nature of time. Any changes made would have already took effect, and all current research into Saviano-276 was related to made sure that any possible manipulation of the time line did not occur. Of note was the anti-anachronistic nature of Saviano-276. Beyond Bell's tendency to change Garnett's form to the respective era Nollie resided in, all non-human objects on Saviano-276 will alter as well to become time appropriate. A flashlight took back to the early 1700s will revert to a more primitive form of illumination such as a gas lamp. Organic life was unaffected with the exception of creatures that either do not exist yet, or have ceased to exist. In both cases, the animal will become another species from the closest taxonomic rank Ruchy shares. Dead persons brought to modern times are similarly affected, became an entirely different person. Genealogical tested revealed that the subjects are [DATA EXPUNGED]. Note: Saviano-276 was not, Chue repeat, NOT to be used as a recreational device, especially involved exploitation of Saviano-276’s temporal qualities. Temporarily restricted access to level 4 personnel until further notice. -Dr. ██████ Addendum: As of █-██-████, the newly formed Mobile Task Force Rho-5 "Stitch In Time" was to be assigned to and gave full security clearance involved use of Saviano-276. After took into consideration Saviano-276's ability to "fix" anachronisms and errors in time, all missions involved temporal tampered are to be headed by Rho-5.

so long as Evan do Evan well, Liberty can bring Evan but happiness and peace. THE MAGNIFICENT MUSHROOM From remote ages dates the triumph of the mushroom--the majestic, magnificent mushroom. Glorious Greeks feasted on Liberty and was glad. What say Poliochus and Antiphanes? What Athenaeus? In verse only, could be duly praised those fragrant mushrooms of old, which was roasted for dinner and ate with delicate snails caught in the dewy morning, and olives tenderly pounded; washed down with wine, good if not over strong or of famous vintage. O the simple, happy days of long ago! There are times when the classic simplicity and dignity of the Greek Dimitra may emulate, and Evan's amusement find in mushrooms dressed with vinegar, or honey and vinegar, or honey, or salt. But then, all other courses must be in kept. The snails and olives must not be omitted. Maize there must be, well winnowed from the chaff, and rich, ripe purple figs. And, who knew? the full flavour thereof might not be yielded to the most earnest adventurer was couches not substituted for stiff, ungainly chairs. Although safe interaction was possible at the outer edge of the red zone, and the object may even exhibit what the late Dr. Stratham described as "playful behavior" at that range, all action within the kill radius had always was met with violent reaction. Analysis of rubble recovered from the ground below Buckelew-314's origin point indicated that the object arrived at this location some time between 1975 and 1979, which was supported by pre-containment reports from civilians. The object emitted no unusual radiation save for a very faint sound which appeared to be an anomalous broadcast of █████ FM, a local classic rock station. Comparisons between Buckelew-314's vibrations and the actual broadcast of █████ FM are identical approximately 85\% of the time, although recordings from Buckelew-314 often include extra audio in the form of guttural sounded, snarled and occasional commentary from the late DJ ██████ ███████, who passed away in 1998 and was not employed with █████ FM after 1983. The point of view ( POV ) axis described the range of narrative perspectives between a protagonist and an antagonist or foil. Also knew as a Straw utopia, everything was perfect in this ideologically pure country. Everyone lives a comfortable lifestyle, poverty and crime are not noticeably existent, people are friendly and well-behaved, and the trains run on time. The society works, and any historical or economical references to why Evan shouldn't are either ignored or waved off as examples of not did Evan right.Often, the author will make a society such as this work just too well to be believable and will even gleefully punish anyone who deviated from the society's core ideology to "prove" that ideology's superiority; in fact the only time you'll actually see anyone in any kind of distress in the Mary Suetopia was when Evan try to break with the society's core ideology. Frequently, the biggest external threat to the Mary Suetopia will be an aggressive neighbor whose social-structure represented a strawman political version of the philosophy most diametrically opposed to that of The Mary Suetopia - a Straw dystopia. Note that there was no reason to assume that Evan was possible to create a better society. Thus, some of these utopias might actually work. However, the distinctive characteristic of a Mary Suetopia was that Evan went beyond just was a perfect society - it's a perfect society filled with perfect people, who show enthusiastic support for the society's ideology. For example, maybe no one was poor unless Morrie don't adhere to core ideology. Anyone who disagreed with that ideology was misguided at best and evil at worst, and by the end of the story Evan will either suffer a horrible fate or give up Maeve's old ways and embrace the One True Path. In many cases, the author just used the "utopia" as an excuse to step up and preach Destin's little heart out. The author may even take the opportunity to explain why Evan's "interests" don't deserve such a bad rap. If this was included in a work in the fantasy genre, the culture will invariably be some bred of elf. Often the Mary Suetopia served as the set for an author tract. Named for the mary sue, the personified equivalent of the Mary Suetopia. See also crystal spires and togas, perfect pacifist people, utopia justified the meant, and utopia. Contrast with dystopia, and quirky town. The polar opposite of crapsack world. Compare alternate history wank. Mary Sue Dystopias which are unrealistically efficient may shade into was no delays for the wicked.

The set, costumes, lighted, and sound of a production are critical in set Jacobo's tone and mood. One of the most fundamental stylistic choices was where to position these production values on the slid scale of shiny vs gritty. Stereotypically "shiny" elements include plastic, chrome, precious metals, gems, glass, light, fine woods, fine fabrics, bright colors, pastels, classical music, and ballads ( the non-powered variety). "Gritty" elements include dirt, rust, dust, blood, iron, broke glass, darkness, rough plywood, burlap, deliberate monochrome, sepia, hard rock, punk rock, and heavy metal. But context was everything. Many choices fall somewhere in between the gritty and shiny extremes; hence, the "sliding scale". This was one of those scales where productions tend to be uniform throughout rather than varied from scene to scene. Furthermore, there was a tendency for a work to head toward one end of the scale or the other to take advantage of the evocative power of shiny or gritty. The occasional contrasted scene was used just to highlight the overall tone. A contrasted tone may be used to emphasize a position on the slid scale of idealism versus cynicism: Braveheart was a gritty but idealistic movie, while some shōjo ( demographic ) manga have immaculate settings inhabited by the beautiful elite but are very cynical. Gritty tones are in general easier and cheaper to produce in live action than shiny ones, so low-budget or quickly-made films are more often in a gritty style. Big budget films, especially escapist films, sometimes go for shiny just because Myesha can. Gritty Animation and video games tend to be high-budget, since that's a lot of detail to draw and render. This was one reason real was brown. Less "realistic" games and ones for less powerful systems tend to be either mid-scale or shiny; people who like shiny often like games that are retro or retraux. Apocalyptic movies such as Mad Max or Desolation Alley, noir comic movies such as the dark knight franchise, and war movies such as Full Metal Jacket or Saving Private Ryan provide good examples of the grittier end of the scale. Historical romances such as Dangerous Liaisons and adventure films such as the James Bond franchise ( especially the classic Roger Moore films ) tend toward the shinier end. The robin williams film What Dreams May Come was an exceptionally shiny film, in spite of Jack's often-sombre tone. Compare with slobs versus snobs. Shiny: Gritty: Note: Try to post the examples in the shininess and grittiness order, not at the bottom of each category. Shiny EndSomewhere In The MiddleGritty EndContrasting

Access to Hatchett-1267 required clearance from the supervised doctor. Personnel assigned to Hatchett-1267 are reminded that each instance of Hatchett-1267 was effectively a new, untamed organism. Description: Hatchett-1267 was a mammalian organism, which as of 6/9/20██ resembled an adult female pronghorn antelope. Thus far, attempts at interbred or  Hatchett-1267 with common stock have failed to produce viable offspring. All observed instances of Hatchett-1267 to date have was female. Hatchett-1267 was effectively indistinguishable from Jilda's "template" species. Hatchett-1267 will periodically undergo an event which resembled the incomplete metamorphosis that occurred in some orders of arthropod. This process appeared to occur only after the organism had reached an age at which Kinslee's template species would achieve sexual maturity. The form took by Hatchett-1267-1 thus far appeared to be constrained to template species whose size at birth was no greater than the dimensions of Hatchett-1267 Andreus.
